name: Underground Conduits ITP001
Preparation
Check clear of other services (The Clearance for gas pipes is 300mm & other services 100mm)
Check cable size to verify conduit size & determine size of trench
Organise barricades, webbing, plates, warning lights (if applicable prior to excavation) - please take a photo
Determine spoil removal, backfill material, compaction, cable marking protection & installment requirements
Installation
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Drawing & revision number(s)
Mark out trench route - Arrange saw cutting if required
Excavate trench & install barricades as required - please take a photo
Determine which way cable will be installed & lay coupling in no friction direction, install conduit glue.
Install draw wire if required
Inspect trench by supply authority if applicable
Inspect & backfill trench
Reinstate & clean area
Install direction marker if applicable
Mark up DGR for future as builts
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
